text: BTW, to people who follow Scripting News in a feed reader, you may notice problems with some of the items, like the one you're reading now. In the new scheme, there will be posts that don't have titles. They're like tweets. Some of them are tweets. Not this one because it has more than 140 chars. Anyway, there will be items without titles. If you have questions, please post an issue on the Scripting News repo on GitHub.
